There's a reason why the Corolla has been around for nearly five decades and 12 generations - it's because people find it reliable and great to drive. It's made to be an everyday family vehicle, and when you're using it to commute to work and get the kids to school, the CVT 'box could work in your favour in stop-go traffic - especially in killer-loadshedding traffic. 

The Toyota Corolla Cross will do so well in South Africa - they know how to build good cars and give them lasting value.
